name: Cannonbeemon
description: CannonBeemon is a Cyborg Digimon and a carrier of the X Antibody . It is a massive Digimon that defends the mysterious "aerial, covert honey base, Royal Base ". The aerial base is exposed to danger from a full 360°, but with its "Sky Rocket ∞" technique, it can completely cover a vast range. The gigantic arms container on top of it boasts an innumerable amount of loaded ordnance.
